dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition just wrapped up with over 625,000 visitors—that's a massive turnout.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition just wrapped up with over six hundred twenty five thousand visitors-that's a massive turnout.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it was held in Jeddah, right? Nine days long, with exhibitors from 48 countries. That's huge for a niche cultural event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it was held in Jeddah, right? Nine days long, with exhibitors from forty eight countries. That's huge for a niche cultural event.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and the CEO, Talal AlShamaisi, really emphasized how it supports Vision 2030 by preserving falconry heritage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and the C E O, Talal AlShamaisi, really emphasized how it supports Vision twenty thirty by preserving falconry heritage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He attributed this achievement to the strong backing of the Saudi Leadership, which is committed to preserving the nation's rich falconry heritage, in line with the objectives of Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, they even had a falcon mask priced at $36,500—adorned with gold and diamonds. That's some serious craftsmanship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, they even had a falcon mask priced at thirty six thousand, five hundred dollars-adorned with gold and diamonds. That's some serious craftsmanship.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the exhibition space expanded to 160,000 square meters this year, 2.5 times bigger than before. No wonder it reached full capacity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the exhibition space expanded to one hundred sixty thousand square meters this year, two point five times bigger than before. No wonder it reached full capacity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exhibition space this year was expanded to three times its previous size, covering 160,000 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They had everything—drone demos, military performances, even workshops. It wasn't just about sales; it was a full cultural experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They had everything-drone demos, military performances, even workshops. It wasn't just about sales; it was a full cultural experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Highlights included remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demonstrations, and military performances. The event also featured more than 20 panel discussions and specialized workshops in falconry, as well as dedicated sections for falcon sales, falconry tools, weapons, hunting gear, camping equipment, motorcycles, bicycles, and off-road vehicles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they signed seven strategic agreements with groups like the Quality of Life Program and King Saud University. That's how you build sustainability.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they signed seven strategic agreements with groups like the Quality of Life Program and King Saud University. That's how you build sustainability.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the Saudi Falcons Club signed seven strategic agreements with national bodies, including the Quality of Life Program, the National Center for Wildlife Development, the Saudi Camel Federation, the Special Forces for Environmental Security, King Saud Universitys Center of Excellence in Biotechnology Research, King Khalid University, and the National Agricultural Services Company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's clear this isn't just a hobbyist thing anymore—it's driving economic activity, attracting global investors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's clear this isn't just a hobbyist thing anymore-it's driving economic activity, attracting global investors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And next up is the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, running till November 15, plus the Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And next up is the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, running till November fifteen, plus the Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Saudi Falcons Club's events for the 2024-2025 season will continue with the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, focused on local falcons, running until November 15. Preparations are also underway for the inaugural Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin, alongside the King Abdulaziz Falconry Festival and the AlUla Falcons Cup.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it's really a year-round effort now, not just a one-off event. They're making falconry a cornerstone of Saudi identity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's really a year-round effort now, not just a one-off event. They're making falconry a cornerstone of Saudi identity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with all those international visitors, it's putting Saudi heritage on the world stage in a big way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with all those international visitors, it's putting Saudi heritage on the world stage in a big way.

artist_script:
HostA: The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition just wrapped up with over 625,000 visitors—that’s a massive turnout.
HostB: Yeah, and it was held in Jeddah, right? Nine days long, with exhibitors from 48 countries. That’s huge for a niche cultural event.
HostA: Absolutely, and the CEO, Talal AlShamaisi, really emphasized how it supports Vision 2030 by preserving falconry heritage.
HostB: I mean, they even had a falcon mask priced at $36,500—adorned with gold and diamonds. That’s some serious craftsmanship.
HostA: And the exhibition space expanded to 160,000 square meters this year, 2.5 times bigger than before. No wonder it reached full capacity.
HostB: They had everything—drone demos, military performances, even workshops. It wasn’t just about sales; it was a full cultural experience.
HostA: Exactly, and they signed seven strategic agreements with groups like the Quality of Life Program and King Saud University. That’s how you build sustainability.
HostB: It’s clear this isn’t just a hobbyist thing anymore—it’s driving economic activity, attracting global investors.
HostA: And next up is the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, running till November 15, plus the Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin.
HostB: So it’s really a year-round effort now, not just a one-off event. They’re making falconry a cornerstone of Saudi identity.
HostA: For sure. And with all those international visitors, it’s putting Saudi heritage on the world stage in a big way.
